name: longdocs
title: Long Docs
description:
This integration contains pretty long documentation.
It is used to show the different visualisations inside a documentation to test how we handle it.
The integration does not contain any assets except the documentation page.

name: multiversion
title: Multi Version Second with the same version! This one should win, because it is first.
description: Multiple versions of this integration exist.

name: reference
title: Reference package
description: This package is used for defining all the properties of a package, the possible assets etc. It serves as a reference on all the config options which are possible.
